title: President confers Civil Awards on nine more Pakistani citizens
content:
ISLAMABAD, 16 Aug (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi has conferred Pakistan Civil Awards on nine more citizens of Pakistan for showing excellence and courage in their respective fields.
The investiture for the following awards will take place on Pakistan Day, 23rd March, 2024, the Cabinet Division said in a press release on Wednesday.
The following are the names of the awardees:-
